---
title: "Recommendations to Government policy makers"
---


```{r}
#| message: false
#| echo: false

library(reactable)
library(tidyverse)

table <- read_csv('table4_recos_to_government_policy_makers.csv') %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(across(1:2, ~ str_squish(str_trim(str_to_sentence(.))))) %>% 
  mutate(across(1:2, ~ str_replace_all(., ' os | Os |Os ', ' OS '))) %>% 
  mutate(across(1:2, ~ str_trim(.)))

reactable(table %>% set_names(~ str_to_sentence(.) %>%
                  str_replace_all('_', ' ')) %>% 
            mutate(Url = str_to_lower(Url)) %>% 
            rename(URL=Url), 
          resizable = TRUE,
          defaultPageSize = 60,
          wrap = TRUE,
          outlined = TRUE,
          striped = TRUE, searchable = TRUE,
          defaultColDef = colDef(minWidth = 100),
          columns = list(
            URL = colDef(cell = function(value) 
              { htmltools::tags$a(href = value, 
                                  target = "_blank", value)
              })
            )
)
```
